messages.subject: Re: Verrrrry interesting !!!
messages.msgSnippet: ... she  spells words funny like some of the one s here (waht) when she s typing  fast! ... friends there dubbed me the Typo Queen LOL LOL! Danielle is on
messages.messageBody:
> I showed this to my dd (13), she loved it! She says sometimes
she spells words funny like some of the one's here (waht) when she's
typing fast!>>>

> lol... I am so notorious for doing that when playing Warcraft, my
friends there dubbed me the Typo Queen LOL

LOL!

Danielle is on WOW all the time! What realm are you in? She's in
Hellscream. Others on this list have given me their realms etc, but
it's hard to get her to switch or create a new character in a different
realm so she can try to connect with other unschoolers (she's getting
higher levels, and likes to experiment with the different
characters). She uses a lot of short hand when typing ("U" for you
etc) because it's quicker.
Jann (I probably should have emailed you this, respond via email if
you prefer!)

there dubbed me the Typo Queen LOL

Jenny
Homeschooling in Greenfield, MA
Danny (12-1-99), Kelsey (11-1-01) and Evelyn (5-19-04)

messages.subject: Verrrrry interesting !!!
messages.msgSnippet: Can you raed tihs?  Olny srmat poelpe can.I cdnuolt blveiee taht I cluod aulaclty uesdnatnrd waht I was rdanieg.The phaonmneal pweor of the hmuan mnid,
messages.messageBody:
Can you raed tihs? Olny srmat poelpe can.I cdnuolt blveiee taht I
cluod aulaclty uesdnatnrd waht I was rdanieg.The phaonmneal pweor
of the hmuan mnid, aoccdrnig to a rscheearch at Cmabrigde
Uinervtisy, it deosn't mttaer in waht oredr the ltteers in a wrod
are, the olny iprmoatnt tihng is taht the frist and lsat ltteer be
in the rghit pclae. The rset can be a taotl mses and you can sitll
raed it wouthit a porbelm. Tihs is bcuseae the huamn mnid deos not
raed ervey lteter by istlef, but the wrod as a wlohe. Amzanig huh?
yaeh and I awlyas tghuhot slpeling was ipmorantt! if you can raed
tihs psas it on!

in peace
-mercy
